name: Sed County
description:
Deep in a desert canyon thirsty lizards are stealing water from a once beautiful oasis. It is up to you, Sed the Cactus, to return this once lovely oasis to its former glory! Fend off the pesky lizards and repair the oasis by returning the stolen water.

This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2020 in Austin, TX!

Credits: 

3D Art: Sigmond Morgan

Rigging: Isaiah Garcia

2D Textures and Text: Sigmond Morgan

2D Art: Haley Price

UI: John Peterson and Sigmond Morgan

Music and Sound Design: Fernando Valadez

Programming: Daniel Wallace and John Petersen

AI and Logic: John Petersen

Level Design: Haley Price
